fields.inlineHelpText: Status of this request.  If the lock icon is displayed, it means the request cannot be edited in its current status.
fields.label: Status
fields.name: Status_image__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Check this if you are correcting a previously submitted request for time off that you are no longer going to take.
fields.label: Reverse previously processed request
fields.name: Balance_Correction__c

fields.inlineHelpText: The last day of the requested time off.
fields.label: End Date
fields.name: End_Date__c

fields.inlineHelpText: By checking this checkbox, you are acknowledging that you have read the negative balance terms and agree to bound by them.
fields.label: I accept terms
fields.name: I_accept_terms__c

fields.inlineHelpText: The policy exception flag indicates that a request does not comply with one or more company policies. (e.g., a request submitted after the time-off was already taken)
fields.label: Policy Exception
fields.name: Policy_Exception__c

fields.inlineHelpText: The first day of the requested time off.
fields.label: Start Date
fields.name: Start_Date__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Number of business days between the Start Date and End Date of this request.  Does not include weekends or company holidays.  This is the number of days that will be deducted from your time-off balance.
fields.label: Number of Days
fields.name: Number_of_Days__c

fields.defaultValueFormula: "I understand that Salesforce.com may allow me to take advance PTO (up to 40 hours). In order to receive this advance, I authorize Salesforce.com to deduct the borrowed PTO from my future vacation accruals. These deductions shall continue each pay period until such time as the total hours of borrowed paid time off advanced to me have been reimbursed in full or until the termination of my employment with Company for any reason, whichever occurs first.  In the event my employment with the Company terminates for any reason before I repay this PTO advance, I acknowledge and agree that any remaining PTO advance shall be deducted by Salesforce.com from my final paycheck upon termination so long as that deduction does not exceed the amount of the deductions that have been regularly made from my paycheck. However, if the outstanding amount of my vacation advance exceeds this regular deduction, I also agree to repay Salesforce.com for any additional vacation advance owed by me upon the date of my employment termination either by payment of a personal check or by authorizing a deduction from my final paycheck for the remaining balance."
fields.label: Negative Balance Terms
fields.name: Negative_Balance_Terms__c
